actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to provide that Federal primary and Federal general elections are held on the last weekend in June and the first weekend in November, respectively, and to provide that polling places are open for at least 8 hours during each day of any such weekend.

summary.text: Directs that Presidential and Congressional elections be conducted on the first full weekend in November and that corresponding primaries be conducted on the last full weekend in the preceding June.

titles.title: A bill to provide that Federal primary and Federal general elections are held on the last weekend in June and the first weekend in November, respectively, and to provide that polling places are open for at least 8 hours during each day of any such weekend.
